name: Grand Celebration Basket
description: A classic mix of champagne, gourmet snacks, and festive treats, perfect for any special occasion.

name: Ultimate Relaxation Basket
description: Includes scented candles, bath salts, herbal teas, and a cozy blanket to help you unwind.

name: Gourmet Feast Basket
description: Packed with artisanal cheeses, cured meats, fine wine, and gourmet crackers for a top-tier tasting experience.

name: Chocolate Indulgence Basket
description: A rich selection of dark, milk, and white chocolates, along with chocolate-covered nuts and cocoa mixes.

name: Coffee Essentials Crate
description: Features premium coffee beans, a high-quality French press, and gourmet biscuits for the perfect brew.

name: Pampered Paws Basket
description: A delightful treat set for your furry friend featuring gourmet pet treats, toys, and grooming essentials.

name: Fresh Fruit Delight
description: A healthy and colorful mix of seasonal fruits including apples, oranges, berries, and grapes.

name: Baby Joy Basket
description: Filled with soft toys, baby lotion, gentle bath products, a cozy blanket, and a cute onesieâ€”perfect for welcoming a newborn.
